meanings.sent1: After leaving the building, his reentrance surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The reentrance into the room was met with applause.
meanings.sent3: His reentrance into the game was like a hero returning to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The reentrance of the sun after a storm brought warmth and light.
meanings.sent5: The reentrance of the melody in the song made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A place or point of reentering.
meanings.sent1: The map showed the reentrance to the cave.
meanings.sent2: The reentrance to the park was through a small gate.
meanings.sent3: The reentrance to the maze led them right back to the start!
meanings.sent4: The reentrance to the forest felt like stepping into a different world.
meanings.sent5: The reentrance to the city was marked by a grand archway.
